external_references.source_name: Cisco Talos Transparent Tribe Education Campaign July 2022
external_references.description: N. Baisini. (2022, July 13). Transparent Tribe begins targeting education sector in latest campaign. Retrieved September 22, 2022.

objects.description: For [C0011](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0011), [Transparent Tribe](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0134) used an updated version of [Crimson](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0115).(Citation: Cisco Talos Transparent Tribe Education Campaign July 2022)
